content: this pattern is also available for free on my blog 1 parsley tea towel is a quick textured knit great for knitting beginners to practice stitches and seasoned knitters looking for an easy relaxing project the tea towel will make lovely kitchen decor for you or as a housewarming gift for a close one parsley is worked in three sections - two wide borders and an inner area it s worked with i-cord edges on both sides for a neat finish instructions for an optional hanging loop included this pattern has been tech edited and test knit **sizes** one size - width 35 cm 14 length 42 cm 16 5 **materials** **yarn ** 170 m 186 yds of 24/7 cotton lion brand yarns - 100% cotton 170 m 186 yds per 100g or similar worsted weight category 4 - medium yarn sample worked in colorway bay leaf **needles ** 5 mm us 8 straight or circular needles 80 - 100 cm 32 - 40 or to fit gauge **other ** tapestry needle **gauge** 18 stitches x 28 row in 10x10 cm 4x4 in garter stitch blocked 1 https //whileberry com/blog/parsley-tea-towel-free-knitting-pattern
